XXbghsic_u:6: tathāhi tatpādasamāśrayeṇa rajo 'pi lakṣmīṃ kurute hi puṃsām // 1.3 //

XXbghsic_u:984: ākarṇya gānaṃ madhupāṅganānāṃ karṇāmṛtaṃ pīta ivāmṛtāṃśuḥ /
XXbghsic_u:992: patiḥ paśunāmiva kālakūṭaṃ patiṃ nadīnāmiva kumbhayoniḥ /
XXbghsic_u:1008: iti buddhaghoṣaviracite padyacūḍāmaṇināmni mahākāvye aṣṭamaḥ sargaḥ //
XXbghsic_u:1062: dīkṣite bhūbhṛtāṃ nāthe nirviṇṇā iva bhūbhṛtaḥ /
XXbghsic_u:1128: tacchaṅkayaiva sā tasmai dadau pātreṇa pāyasam /
XXbghsic_u:1163: pañcānanaṃ vinā ko hi kuñjaraṃ śāsituṃ kṣamaḥ! // 9.77 //
XXbghsic_u:1165: mandareṇa vinā sindhuṃ mathituṃ kena pāryate! // 9.78 //
XXbghsic_u:1167: kumbhayoniṃ vinā ko hi kovidaḥ sindhucūṣaṇe // 9.79 //
XXbghsic_u:1175: ko vābhyupāyo bhuvane mama syādityāśu cintājvaranirduto 'bhūt // 9.83 //
XXbghsic_u:1176: iti śrībuddhaghoṣaviracite padyacūḍāmaṇināmni mahākāvye navamaḥ sargaḥ //
XXbghsic_u:1200: āviścakāra bhuvaneṣu paraṃ nipīḍāmāḍambaraḥ paṭahajo madanaprayāṇe //
XXbghsic_u:1202: naukā ivoddhurasarasvati naṣṭamārgā bhremurbhṛśaṃ surapathe sumanovimānāḥ
XXbghsic_u:1214: kalpakṣayo 'miti kaiṭabhajid bhrameṇa bhūyo 'pi viśvamudare parihartumaicchat // 10.19 //
XXbghsic_u:1225: pātālaloka iva bhūvalayo babhūva bhūsanniveśa iva puṇyakṛtāṃ nivāsaḥ //
XXbghsic_u:1227: bhūmīdharāḥ paramabhūmidharā babhūvuḥ śeṣo 'pi kevalamabhūt phaṇamālabhārī // 10.25 //
XXbghsic_u:1229: pāthodhayaḥ sapadi paṅkadhayastadāsan pāthodharā nabhasi paṅkadharā babhūvuḥ // 10.26 //
XXbghsic_u:1232: senāmbudhau jayipadātimahāpravāhe magnāḥ kulakṣitidharā iva vāraṇendrāḥ /
XXbghsic_u:1233: tvaṅgattaraṅganivahā iva tuṅgavāhāa naumaṇḍalā iva rathāḥ sutarāṃ virejuḥ // 10.28 //
XXbghsic_u:1235: ambhonidhiṃ nijabalodadhinā vijitya bandīkṛtā iva tadīyapurandhrivargāḥ //
XXbghsic_u:1245: śuddhātmanāmakṛtadānaphalonnatīnāṃ kiṃ kiṃ na sidhyati kṛtākṣayapakṣakāṇām
XXbghsic_u:1247: kuṇṭhīkṛtātmagatayaḥ kusumāstrabāṇāḥ kṛtyā iva pratinivṛtya tameva jaghnuḥ
XXbghsic_u:1249: taṃ sthūlalakṣamupagamya na dānalābhaṃ ko vā dadātu guṇahīnaviceṣṭitāya //
XXbghsic_u:1251: āsādya buddhamabhajan sumanomayatvaṃ satsaṅgatiḥ suralateva na kiṃ karoti // 10.37 //
XXbghsic_u:1253: sadyo gateṣu mṛdutāṃ sa hi śambarārirvyāroṣadagdhahṛdayo mṛdutāṃ na bheje
XXbghsic_u:1254: cetobhavasya saphalā api sāyakāste taṃ prāpya śāntahṛdayaṃ viphalā babhūvuḥ /
XXbghsic_u:1255: daive sameyuṣi parāṅmukhatāṃ hi sarvaṃ hastopayātamapi hanta! vināśameti
XXbghsic_u:1256: itthaṃ jagattrayatiraskaraṇakṣameṣu sarveṣu hanta! viśikheṣu nirarthakeṣu /
XXbghsic_u:1260: taṃ prātya sarvaguṇabhāraguruṃ munīndraṃ na prāgabhavaccalayituṃ sa mahājavo 'pi /
XXbghsic_u:1261: naitad vicitramakhilāṭavighasmarasya dāvānalasya na hi mūrchati śaktirapsu
XXbghsic_u:1265: āpūritā paramapāramikā mayaiva tatsākṣiṇī mama mahāpṛtanetyavocat // 10.44
XXbghsic_u:1267: māraḥ palāyata tato mahatā balena bhraṣṭātapatrarathaketukuthena bhītaḥ //
XXbghsic_u:1271: karṇāmṛtāni vacanāni ca kātarākṣyaḥ kāmāṅganā vidadhire karuṇākṣarāṇi //
XXbghsic_u:1273: utpāṭya locanayugaṃ dvijapuṅgavāya tvāṃ dattavāniti kathaṃ bruvate purāṇāḥ // 10.48 //
XXbghsic_u:1277: ucchīdya mastakamudastaripuprabhāvaṃ tvāṃ dattavāniti vadanti kathaṃ kavīndrāḥ // 10.50 //
XXbghsic_u:1278: puṇyātmanāmadhipate! puruṣottamatvamāptuṃ padaṃ tvamabhivāñchasi kiṃ tapobhiḥ /
XXbghsic_u:1279: asmāsu kāmapi vadhūmadhiropaya tvaṃ vakṣastaṭe mahati meruśilāviśāle //
XXbghsic_u:1290: itthaṃ puṣpaśarāsanasya vijayavyāpāraśuṣkasthitāṃ sambodhiprasadāṃ niveśya sudṛśaṃ śrībodhimūle varaḥ /
XXbghsic_u:1293: iti buddhaghoṣaviracite padyacūḍāmaṇināmni mahākāvye siddhārthacarite daśamaḥ sargaḥ //
